channel.title: Telnet on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Telnet on TLDRBins

item.title: memcache
item.description: Connect telnet memcached-cli # Connect telnet 127.0.0.1 11211 # Install sudo npm install -g memcached-cli # Connect (With Creds) memcached-cli <USER>:<PASSWORD>@10.10.11.10:11211 Basic Commmands # Info about slabs stats slabs # Show slab info (e.g. slab 1 and display all keys) stats cachedump 1 0 # Dump info get <ITEM_NAME>

item.title: POP3
item.description: Basic # Connect to POP3 mail server telnet 10.10.11.10 110 # Send cmd after +OK USER <USER> PASS <PASSWORD> # List all mails LIST # Retrieve mail #1 RETR 1 # Exit Ctrl + ], then quit
